trans-unit.source: Provides a customizable activity designer surface for users to visually modify on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce una superficie dell'ActivityDesigner personalizzabile per gli utenti possono modificare visivamente su una superficie di progettazione del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The FreeformActivityDesigner allows users to modify how an activity appears on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Il FreeformActivityDesigner consente agli utenti di modificare l'aspetto di un'attività nell'area di progettazione del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: When you associate FreeformActivityDesigner with a custom activity class using the `Designer` attribute, the custom activity's appearance is different from other activities when a user drops the custom activity onto a design surface.
trans-unit.target: Quando si associano FreeformActivityDesigner a una classe di attività personalizzata utilizzando il `Designer` attributo, aspetto dell'attività personalizzata è diverso da altre attività quando un utente rilascia l'attività personalizzata su un'area di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: Once FreeformActivityDesigner displays an activity on the design surface, users can draw connectors to other activity designers and resize the designer within the parameters defined by the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Una volta FreeformActivityDesigner visualizzata un'attività nell'area di progettazione, gli utenti possono disegnare connettori ad altri ActivityDesigner e ridimensionare la finestra di progettazione all'interno dei parametri definiti dall'area di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Users can only add connectors to the custom activity because the FreeformActivityDesigner is associated with the top-level activity in a workflow.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Gli utenti possono aggiungere connettori solo all'attività personalizzata in quanto il FreeformActivityDesigner è associata all'attività di primo livello in un flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> that accessibility applications use to adjust the application UI for users who have impairments.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> utilizzato dalle applicazioni di accessibilità per adattare l'interfaccia utente dell'applicazione per utenti diversamente abili.

trans-unit.source: If no `AccessibleObject` is currently assigned to the control, a new instance of one is created.
trans-unit.target: Se nessun `AccessibleObject` è attualmente assegnato al controllo, viene creata una nuova istanza di uno.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the `AccessibilityObject` property, you must add a reference to the Accessibility assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Da ottenere o impostare il `AccessibilityObject` proprietà, è necessario aggiungere un riferimento all'assembly Accessibility installato con .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] accessible objects, see the Active Accessibility section of the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]gli oggetti accessibili, vedere la sezione Active Accessibility di MSDN Library.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> associato al controllo.

trans-unit.source: Adds a connector to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un connettore per il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: AddConnector is called when a user adds a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: AddConnector viene chiamato quando un utente aggiunge un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to begin drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> posizione da cui iniziare a disegnare il connettore.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to finish drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> percorso in cui terminare di disegnare il connettore.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> that was added to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> che è stato aggiunto per il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: source or target contains a reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: sourceo target contiene un riferimento ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The property for source or target contains a reference ().
trans-unit.target: The property for source or target contains a reference ().

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> is not the container for the connector to add.
trans-unit.target: Corrente <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> non è il contenitore per il connettore da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> is resized automatically when a user resizes the designer's child designers.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> viene ridimensionato automaticamente quando un utente ridimensiona le finestre di progettazione figlio della finestra di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: When you set AutoSize, the layout of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is updated.
trans-unit.target: Quando si imposta AutoSize, il layout del <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>viene aggiornato.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> is resized automatically; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> viene ridimensionato automaticamente; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the margin size to render around the child designers when the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> is automatically resized.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta le dimensioni del margine per eseguire il rendering intorno a finestre di progettazione figlio quando il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> viene ridimensionata automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: The default size of AutoSizeMargin is a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> object with dimensions of 40 pixels by 40 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Le dimensioni predefinite del AutoSizeMargin sono un <xref:System.Drawing.Size>oggetto con le dimensioni di 40 pixel per 40 pixel.</xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property associated with the current workflow theme is set to `true`, AutoSizeMargin settings are half the height and half the width of the grid size.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>associato al tema del flusso di lavoro corrente è impostata su `true`, le impostazioni di AutoSizeMargin sono la metà dell'altezza e metà della larghezza delle dimensioni della griglia.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When you set AutoSizeMargin, the layout of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is updated.
trans-unit.target: Quando si imposta AutoSizeMargin, il layout del <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>viene aggiornato.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the size of the margin to render around the child designers of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> che rappresenta la dimensione del margine per eseguire il rendering di finestre di progettazione il figlio del <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref> settings for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"> </xref> le impostazioni per il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default behavior of AutoSizeMode allows the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> to grow as necessary to fit its contents but does not shrink smaller than the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il comportamento predefinito di AutoSizeMode consente il <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>di ingrandirsi in base al contenuto ma non riduce rispetto al valore della <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: When you set AutoSizeMode, the layout of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is updated.
trans-unit.target: Quando si imposta AutoSizeMode, il layout del <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>viene aggiornato.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default setting is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'impostazione predefinita è <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Brings the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to the top of the z-order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Porta specificato <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> nella parte superiore dello z-order del <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: BringToFront modifies the z-order for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> to display the specified <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> as its top visible child designer.
trans-unit.target: BringToFront modifica l'ordine z per il <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>per visualizzare l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>come relativa finestra di progettazione figlio visibile superiore.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to display a designer at the top of the z-order when a user selects it.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questo metodo per visualizzare una finestra di progettazione nella parte superiore dello z-order quando un utente le seleziona.

trans-unit.source: `containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call BringToFront.
trans-unit.target: `containedDesigner`deve essere in un elemento figlio del <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>prima di chiamare BringToFront.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If it is not, BringToFront throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, BringToFront genera un <xref:System.ArgumentException>.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to bring to the top of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> per portare nella parte superiore dello z-order.

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner contains a reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: containedDesignercontiene un riferimento ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner is not found in the collection.
trans-unit.target: containedDesignernon è presente nella insieme.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can create a connection between the specified connection point on a source child activity designer and the specified connection point on a target child activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> possibile creare una connessione tra il punto di connessione specificata in un ActivityDesigner figlio di origine e il punto di connessione specificato in un ActivityDesigner figlio di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> to check on the source activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> da controllare nell'ActivityDesigner di origine.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> to check on the target activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> da controllare nell'ActivityDesigner di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can draw a connector between source and target activity designers; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> può disegnare un connettore tra gli ActivityDesigner di origine e di destinazione; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can be collapsed on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> può essere compresso in un'area di progettazione del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: CanExpandCollapse always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce sempre CanExpandCollapse `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can be collapsed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> può essere compresso; in caso contrario <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a user can visually resize the specified child activity designer in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se un utente può ridimensionare visivamente l'ActivityDesigner figlio specificato nella <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a derived class, CanResizeContainedDesigner returns `true` if `containedDesigner` is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: A meno che non viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, restituisce CanResizeContainedDesigner `true` se `containedDesigner` è un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Other types of designers cannot be resized.
trans-unit.target: Non è possibile ridimensionare altri tipi di finestre di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to check.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> da controllare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a user can visually resize the specified activity designer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se un utente può ridimensionare visivamente l'ActivityDesigner specificato. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> is added to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando un <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> viene aggiunto per il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorAdded%2A> is the registered delegate event handler for the ConnectorAdded event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorAdded%2A>è il gestore eventi delegati registrato per l'evento ConnectorAdded.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorAdded%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user changes the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> locations associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> displayed by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando un utente modifica il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> percorsi associati un <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> visualizzato per il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A connector is changed when a user changes the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> locations at either end of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> object.
trans-unit.target: Un connettore viene modificato quando un utente modifica il <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>percorsi in delle estremità di una <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>oggetto.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorChanged%2A> is the registered delegate event handler for the ConnectorChanged event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorChanged%2A>è il gestore eventi delegati registrato per l'evento ConnectorChanged.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user removes a connector from the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando l'utente rimuove un connettore dal <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A> is the registered delegate event handler for the ConnectorRemoved event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A>è il gestore eventi delegati registrato per l'evento ConnectorRemoved.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of connectors that are associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta di sola lettura di connettori che sono associate le <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A connector is the line that appears on a workflow design surface that connects one activity designer to another.
trans-unit.target: Un connettore è la linea visualizzata nell'area di progettazione del flusso di lavoro che si connette a un ActivityDesigner a un altro.

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection that contains all <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> objects associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta di sola lettura che contiene tutti <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> oggetti associati con la <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a connector between the two specified connection points.
trans-unit.target: Crea un connettore tra i due punti di connessione specificata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to begin drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> posizione da cui iniziare a disegnare il connettore.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to finish drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> percorso in cui terminare di disegnare il connettore.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> that was created.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> che è stato creato.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite usate dal <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> e facoltativamente rilascia le risorse gestite.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer is being disposed; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the designer is being finalized.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se viene eliminata la finestra di progettazione, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se la finestra di progettazione viene finalizzato.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether users can drag and draw connectors on the free-form activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se gli utenti possono trascinare e disegnare connettori sulla superficie dell'ActivityDesigner in formato libero.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if users can drag and draw connectors on the free-form activity designer surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se gli utenti possono trascinare e disegnare connettori sulla superficie di progettazione di attività in formato libero. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can be visually resized on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> può essere ridimensionata visivamente sull'area di progettazione del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode>, EnableVisualResizing returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>è impostato su `true` e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A>è impostato su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode>, EnableVisualResizing restituisce `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: In all other conditions EnableVisualResizing returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: In tutte le altre condizioni restituisce EnableVisualResizing `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can be visually resized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> può essere ridimensionata visivamente; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the first selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il primo oggetto selezionabile nell'ordine di navigazione del <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: FirstSelectableObject returns the first child designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> collection, or a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the collection count is zero.
trans-unit.target: FirstSelectableObject restituisce la prima finestra di progettazione figlio di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A>insieme, o un `null` riferimento (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) se il numero di raccolte è pari a zero.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il primo oggetto selezionabile nell'ordine di navigazione del <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the first selectable object that follows the specified object in the navigation order of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il primo oggetto selezionabile che segue l'oggetto specificato nell'ordine di navigazione corrente <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref:System.Object> in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: Corrente <xref:System.Object>nell'ordine di navigazione.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection"></xref> enumeration value that determines the navigation order of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection"> </xref> valore di enumerazione che determina l'ordine di navigazione della finestra di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: The first selectable that follows the obj parameter in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: Il primo selezionabile che segue il obj parametro nell'ordine di navigazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of glyphs that are displayed on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di icone visualizzate nel <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Glyphs returns a glyph for each connectable child designer found on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Icone restituisce un'icona per ogni finestra di progettazione figlio trovata su <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection"></xref> that contains the glyphs displayed on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection"> </xref> che contiene le icone visualizzate nel <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the <xref uid="langword_csharp_FreeformActivityDesigner" name="FreeformActivityDesigner" href=""></xref> at the specified coordinates on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce informazioni relative ai <xref uid="langword_csharp_FreeformActivityDesigner" name="FreeformActivityDesigner" href=""> </xref> corrispondenza delle coordinate specificate nella finestra di progettazione del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: HitTest checks whether the location has occurred on a connector or one of the child activity designers.
trans-unit.target: HitTest controlla se il percorso si è verificato in un connettore o in uno degli ActivityDesigner figlio.

trans-unit.source: If the HitTest occurs on a child activity that is being dragged to another location, HitTest returns information about the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, not the designer being moved.
trans-unit.target: In caso di HitTest su un'attività figlio che viene trascinata in un'altra posizione, HitTest restituisce informazioni relative ai <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, non la finestra di progettazione spostata.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that contains the coordinates on the workflow design surface from which to gather information.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> che contiene le coordinate nella finestra di progettazione del flusso di lavoro da cui raccogliere informazioni.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that contains information about the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> at the specified coordinates
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> che contiene informazioni sul <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> alle coordinate specificate

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> by using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> utilizzando l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: `Initialize` adds a designer property extender to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> for it to use until the design surface is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: `Initialize`Aggiunge un'estensione di proprietà della finestra di progettazione per il <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>affinché questo possa utilizzarla fino a quando non viene eliminato definitivamente l'area di progettazione.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> with which to initialize the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> con cui inizializzare la <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified read-only collection of activities to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> at the specified location on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge la raccolta di sola lettura specificata delle attività per il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> nella posizione specificata nell'area di progettazione del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that specifies the location to add the activities.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> che specifica il percorso per aggiungere le attività.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> read-only collection that contains the activities to add to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> raccolta di sola lettura che contiene le attività da aggiungere per il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the last selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'ultimo oggetto selezionabile nell'ordine di navigazione del <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: LastSelectableObject returns the last child designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> property or a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> does not contain any child designers.
trans-unit.target: LastSelectableObject restituisce l'ultima finestra di progettazione figlio di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A>proprietà o un `null` riferimento (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) se il <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>non contiene finestre di progettazione figlio.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that is the last selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Object>che rappresenta l'ultimo oggetto selezionabile nell'ordine di navigazione della finestra di progettazione.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la posizione del <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> nelle coordinate logiche.

trans-unit.source: When Location is set due to a user resizing the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, the designer maintains the relative positions of its child designers.
trans-unit.target: Quando percorso viene impostato a causa di un utente ridimensiona la <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, la finestra di progettazione mantiene le posizioni delle finestre di progettazione figlio.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Point" name="Point" href=""></xref> that represents the location of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref uid="langword_csharp_Point" name="Point" href=""> </xref> che rappresenta la posizione del <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> nelle coordinate logiche.

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum size settings for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le impostazioni di dimensioni minime per il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the smallest possible size for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> che rappresenta le dimensioni più piccole possibili per il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Moves activities to a specified location within the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Sposta le attività in una posizione specificata all'interno dell'area di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: Location to move activities to.
trans-unit.target: Posizione in cui spostare le attività.

trans-unit.source: Collection that contains the activities to move to `moveLocation.`
trans-unit.target: Raccolta che contiene le attività da spostare in`moveLocation.`

trans-unit.source: Moves the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Sposta l'oggetto <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> nel percorso specificato.

trans-unit.source: MoveContainedDesigner sets new bounds for the moved designer and performs all required layout operations for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: MoveContainedDesigner imposta nuovi limiti per la finestra di progettazione spostata ed esegue tutte le operazioni di layout obbligatorie per la <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>nell'area di progettazione del flusso di lavoro.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: `containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call MoveContainedDesigner.
trans-unit.target: `containedDesigner`deve essere in un elemento figlio del <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>prima di chiamare MoveContainedDesigner.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If it is not, MoveContainedDesigner throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, MoveContainedDesigner genera un <xref:System.ArgumentException>.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to move.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> da spostare.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the designer's new location.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> che rappresenta una nuova posizione della finestra di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner contains a reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: containedDesignercontiene un riferimento ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner is not found in the collection.
trans-unit.target: containedDesignernon è presente nella insieme.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorAdded"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorAdded"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorChanged"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: A connector is changed when a user changes the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> locations at either end of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> object.
trans-unit.target: Un connettore viene modificato quando un utente modifica il <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>percorsi in delle estremità di una <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>oggetto.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorRemoved"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorRemoved"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when a child activity is added or deleted from its <xref uid="langword_csharp_Activities" name="Activities" href=""></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Invia una notifica di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando un'attività figlio viene aggiunto o eliminata dal relativo <xref uid="langword_csharp_Activities" name="Activities" href=""> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the added or removed activities.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene informazioni sulle attività aggiunte o rimosse.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when a connection has been established between two of its contained activity designers.
trans-unit.target: Invia una notifica di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando è stata stabilita una connessione tra due ActivityDesigner contenuti.

trans-unit.source: OnContainedDesignersConnected is called when a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> is drawn between the source on one of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> object's contained activity designers to target on a second contained activity designer.
trans-unit.target: OnContainedDesignersConnected viene chiamato quando un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>viene disegnato tra l'origine su uno del <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>ActivityDesigner e la destinazione in un secondo ActivityDesigner contenuto contenuti dell'oggetto.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to begin drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> posizione da cui iniziare a disegnare il connettore.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to finish drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> percorso in cui terminare di disegnare il connettore.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is completed within the bounds of its design surface.
trans-unit.target: Invia una notifica di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando un'operazione di trascinamento e rilascio viene completata entro i limiti della relativa area di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"> </xref> che definisce gli argomenti dell'evento operazione.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor is inside the bounds of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Invia una notifica di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando è in corso un'operazione di trascinamento e rilascio e il cursore del mouse è all'interno dei limiti della finestra di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"> </xref> che definisce gli argomenti dell'evento operazione.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed when the designer has the keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando viene premuto un tasto quando la finestra di progettazione ha lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Performs layout tasks to position visual cues and child designers on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esegue attività di layout per posizionare segnali visivi e finestre di progettazione figlio sul <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref> che definisce gli argomenti dell'evento operazione.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when the size of the visual cues on the designers displayed by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> have changed.
trans-unit.target: Invia una notifica di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando la dimensione dei segnali visivi nelle finestre di progettazione visualizzata per il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> sono stati modificati.

trans-unit.source: OnLayoutSize returns the size of the current bounding rectangle for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> when <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: OnLayoutSize restituisce le dimensioni del rettangolo di delimitazione corrente per il <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>quando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>è impostato su `false`.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnLayoutSize calculates and returns new size settings for the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>è impostato su `true` e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A>è impostato su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnLayoutSize calcola e restituisce nuove impostazioni della dimensione per il rettangolo di delimitazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to true and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnLayoutSize returns <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>è impostata su true e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A>non è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnLayoutSize restituisce <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref> che definisce gli argomenti dell'evento operazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the new size of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> che rappresenta le dimensioni di nuovo il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> nell'area di progettazione del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when a user is visually resizing it at design time.
trans-unit.target: Invia una notifica di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando un utente è esegue il ridimensionamento visivo in fase di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnResizing performs all resizing tasks on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>è impostato su `true` e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A>è impostato su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnResizing esegue tutte le attività di ridimensionamento nell'area di progettazione del flusso di lavoro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnResizing performs layout tasks, but no resizing tasks.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>è impostato su `true` e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A>è impostato su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnResizing esegue attività di layout, ma non quelle di ridimensionamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `false`, all contained designers retain their previous locations on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>è impostato su `false`indipendente tutte le finestre di progettazione conservano i percorsi precedenti su <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs"> </xref> che definisce gli argomenti dell'evento operazione.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> that its associated theme has changed.
trans-unit.target: Invia una notifica di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> che è stato modificato il tema associato.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a derived class, OnThemeChange always sets the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Text%2A> property to an empty string and the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> property to `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: A meno che non viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, imposta sempre OnThemeChange il <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Text%2A>proprietà in una stringa vuota e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A>proprietà `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A> is set to `true`, the locations of each child designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is snapped to the nearest grid line.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A>è impostato su `true`, i percorsi di ogni finestra di progettazione figlio di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>vengono bloccati sulla riga della griglia più vicina.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> that contains the updated theme property settings.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"> </xref> che contiene le impostazioni delle proprietà del tema aggiornato.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> dal <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: RemoveConnector deletes the specified connector from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Connectors%2A> collection and calls the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: RemoveConnector Elimina il connettore specificato dal <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Connectors%2A>insieme e chiama il <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Connectors%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> da rimuovere.

trans-unit.source: connector contains a reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: connectorcontiene un riferimento ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Resizes the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to the dimensions of specified size.
trans-unit.target: Ridimensiona l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> alle dimensioni della dimensione specificata.

trans-unit.source: ResizeContainedDesigner sets new bounds for the resized designer and performs all required layout operations for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: ResizeContainedDesigner imposta nuovi limiti per la finestra di progettazione ridimensionata ed esegue tutte le operazioni di layout obbligatorie per la <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>nell'area di progettazione del flusso di lavoro.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: `containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call ResizeContainedDesigner.
trans-unit.target: `containedDesigner`deve essere in un elemento figlio del <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>prima di chiamare ResizeContainedDesigner.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If it is not, ResizeContainedDesigner throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, ResizeContainedDesigner genera un <xref:System.ArgumentException>.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to resize.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> da ridimensionare.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the new dimensions of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> che rappresenta le nuove dimensioni della finestra di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner contains a reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: containedDesignercontiene un riferimento ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner is not found in the collection.
trans-unit.target: containedDesignernon è presente nella insieme.

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to the bottom of the z-order of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_FreeformActivityDesigner" name="FreeformActivityDesigner" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Imposta l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> nella parte inferiore dello z-order del <xref uid="langword_csharp_FreeformActivityDesigner" name="FreeformActivityDesigner" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: SendToBack modifies the z-order for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> to display the specified <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> as the bottom visible designer on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: SendToBack modifica l'ordine z per il <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>per visualizzare l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>come la finestra di progettazione visibile inferiore nell'area di progettazione.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to display a designer at the bottom of the z-order when a user deselects it.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questo metodo per visualizzare una finestra di progettazione nella parte inferiore dello z-order quando un utente venga deselezionata.

trans-unit.source: `containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call SendToBack.
trans-unit.target: `containedDesigner`deve essere in un elemento figlio del <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>prima di chiamare SendToBack.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If it is not, SendToBack throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, SendToBack genera un <xref:System.ArgumentException>.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to set to the back of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> da impostare sulla parte posteriore dello z-order.

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner contains a reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: containedDesignercontiene un riferimento ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner is not found in the collection.
trans-unit.target: containedDesignernon è presente nella insieme.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> draws connectors in the foreground of its design surface.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> disegna connettori nel primo piano dell'area di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a class that derives from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, ShowConnectorsInForeground always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: A meno che non viene sottoposto a override in una classe che deriva da <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, restituisce sempre ShowConnectorsInForeground `false`.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> draws connectors in the foreground of its design surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> disegna connettori nel primo piano della progettazione superficie; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
